comments.comments_text: GOAL! Saul Niguez (Atl. Madrid) finds the back of the net from close in from a very acute angle.

comments.comments_text: It looks like Rodrigo de Paul (Atl. Madrid) saw red with that tackle. Mario Melero Lopez won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.

comments.comments_text: Here comes the VAR verdict: Referee Mario Melero Lopez signals that the goal stands! The Atl. Madrid players celebrate. Goal! Antoine Griezmann (Atl. Madrid) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball low into the middle of the net. It's 0:2.
